amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available under this Act may be expended to administer or enforce the requirements of subchapter IV of chapter 31 or title 40, United States Code (commonly referred to as the Davis-Bacon Act), except with respect to a contract that exceeds $20,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to administer or enforce the requirements of the Davis-Bacon Act, except with respect to a contract that exceeds $20 million.
